title: Gold Rises to Record High as Crisis Over Greenland Worsens
description: Gold rose to a record high — and silver was near an all-time peak — as the worsening crisis over Greenland and a meltdown in Japanese government debt supported haven demand.
content: Gold rose to a record high — and silver was near an all-time peak — as the worsening crisis over Greenland and a meltdown in Japanese government debt supported haven demand.
